chapters.title: The Find-Outers make their first plans

tracks.title: The Find-Outers make their first plans

chapters.title: The mystery of the red-headed boys

tracks.title: The mystery of the red-headed boys

metadata.description: Someone is sending spiteful letters to the people of Peterswood - but who? Fatty, Larry, Pip, Daisy, Bets and Buster the Dog have to find the culprit who is making the villagers so unhappy. But Mr Goon is right on their heels to solve the mystery first! In the original 1946 text, Fatty's nickname is based on the fact that his initials are F.A.T. as well as his size. All references to his size have been removed from this recording (based on the text from 2016) so that Fatty's nickname refers to his initials only.
metadata.author: Enid Blyton
